Layer.PlaySoundCommand: %function(self) StartNumber = math.random(1,2) local Pr = PROFILEMAN:GetMachineProfile():GetSaved() if Pr.DWIAnnouncer then if StartNumber == 1 then AudioPlay('Internal/go/action') elseif StartNumber == 2 then AudioPlay('Internal/go/go!') else AudioPlay('Internal/go/action') end end end
